name: Cohort 1 - Auction Bidder
description:
Contribution: Cohort 1 - Auction Bidder

_This SBT represents a proof of contribution to the 1729 Writers Cohort #1. 1729 Writers (https://paper.li/1729writers) is an experiment in coordinating independent writing with decentralized funding, focused on truth, health, wealth, and other ideas related to Balaji Srinivasan's new book The Network State (https://thenetworkstate.com)_
